snippet: Cornel Lucas made his name photographing celebrities for decades, understanding light in a way as to almost stitch it into the faces of famous subjects like Brigitte Bardot, Gregory Peck and Marlene Dietrich.
abstract: Cornel Lucas made his name photographing celebrities for decades, understanding light in a way as to almost stitch it into the faces of famous subjects like Brigitte Bardot, Gregory Peck and Marlene Dietrich.

headline.main: At 91, a Photo Legend Looks Back
